title: Nevada's School Choice Law Encounters Growing Pains
text:
03 Nevada's School Choice Law Encounters Growing Pains 
Education Week: The new school choice law in Nevada giving parents near-total control over the way state education dollars are spent on their children was heralded as "groundbreaking" and "historic" when the governor signed it in June. But in the short time since, with hundreds of applications pouring in, state officials are encountering challenges as they try to put the law into practice without any roadmap.
